    • addElementToPublication

      public static void addElementToPublication(Publication publication, MediaPackageElement element)
      Adds a MediaPackageElement to this publication by determining its type.
      Parameters:
      publication - The Publication to add the MediaPackageElement to.
      element - The MediaPackageElement to add. If it is not a Attachment, Catalog or Track it will not be added to the Publication.
